alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Seneca; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 8:02PM EDT until June 15 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Southeastern Wood County in northwestern Ohio... Northeastern Hancock County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 802 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fostoria, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Findlay, Tiffin, Fostoria, Bellevue, Green Springs, Bloomville, Arcadia, Attica, Bloomdale, Bettsville, Republic, Jerry City, West Millgrove, Bairdstown, Flat Rock, Bascom and Kansas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
